devdoc.author: Duong Van Sang
devdoc.details: Crowd Colla is smart contract is contract that allow creators and entrepreneurs to get fund from supporters for their project, and also let supporter join in approving their expense items

approveRequest(uint256).details: Approve expense request from manager, apply for supporter only

params.creator: who is author and manage project
params.description: description of campaign, purpose of campaign
params.minContribution: minimum money can contribute for project (in ETH)

contribute().details: payable of campaign, where supporter send Ethereum to contribute for campaign

createRequest(string,uint256,address).details: Create a expense request, only manager of campaign are able to do it

params.amount: total money need for expense items
params.recipient: who, which address will reiceive money when request is approved

finalizeRequest(uint256).details: finalize expense request and transfer money to receiver

support().details: payable of campaign, where supporter send Ethereum to contribute for campaign
